description:
The Warhammer 40k Adeptus Mechanicus faction might be the most inhuman, contradictory offshoot of the human species in the Dark Millennium of Warhammer 40k. It is a religious cult devoted to technology, both superstitious of science and yet utterly avaricious in the pursuit of knowledge.

Continue reading Warhammer 40k: Adeptus Mechanicus guide
MORE FROM WARGAMER: How to play Warhammer 40k , All about Warhammer 40k 10th Edition</
title: Warhammer 40k: Adeptus Mechanicus guide

description:
Gale Force Nine has announced a new alternate history WW2 wargame, Clash of Steel, which brings the forces of the USA, Soviets, Britain, and Germany back into the fight in 1948. The wargame will focus on tank-on-tank battles between the major belligerents, and uses the firm’s highly detailed 15mm scale plastic miniatures to depict massed … Continued

description:

description:
YuGiOh Master Duel introduced a new way to play the TCG in 2022, and a YuGiOh Master Duel banlist quickly followed. Digital Yugioh is expanding all the time, often in different directions from its tabletop sibling, so it naturally needs its own card bans to fix what gets broken. This banlist gets updated pretty regularly – so we track the changes in this guide, to let you know the latest bans with minimal fuss.

Continue reading YuGiOh Master Duel Banlist February 2024

title: YuGiOh Master Duel Banlist February 2024

description:
Wizards of the Coast has revealed the seven MTG cards that will make up the Sheldon Menery memorial Secret Lair. Profits from the sale of the limited edition cards will be donated to the American Cancer Society. The MTG Commander Rules Committee previewed the cards in a Twitch stream on Thursday.
